subject: Horse Racing
Horses
organizations: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
lead_paragraph: Jeff Mullins, who trains the Kentucky Derby favorite I Want Revenge, was suspended for seven days and fined for administering a cough remedy to a horse before a race.
snippet: Jeff Mullins, who trains the Kentucky Derby favorite I Want Revenge, was suspended for seven days and fined for administering a cough remedy to a horse before a race.
